catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 873
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: conical, bowl-shaped top section; conical base has three tiers of rectangular perforations in incised bands with perforations connected by incised wavy lines; two bands of wavy incised lines, separated by pairs of ribs, on top section; blackish-grey patina
medium: Stoneware with incised design of wavy lines
title: Tall stand with perforated base
